scripts.build: npm run build:gcc && npm run build:gzip
scripts.build:gcc: java -jar ./node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --module_resolution WEBPACK --assume_function_wrapper --isolation_mode IIFE --use_types_for_optimization --language_in ECMASCRIPT_NEXT --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2015 --externs externs/superfine.js --generate_exports --export_local_property_definitions --compilation_level ADVANCED --js_output_file=dist/main.js 'src/**.js'
